ej,melvb001,M,diazl901,Catch/trap call $pitcher Brandon McCarthy made a diving catch of the bunt and his glove folded under his arm; he rolled on his back and threw to 3B to double up Craig Gentry, who had crossed the plate on the safety squeeze play; HP umpire Laz Diaz ruled that McCarthy trapped the ball; all runners were safe; McCarthy was angry and yelled at Diaz; Athletics manager Bob Melvin ran out and held a long argument with Diaz before being ejected by Diaz

$a blinding flash of lightning that seemed to be directly above the stadium was followed immediately by a tremendously loud boom of thunder; Josh Willingham hit the ground while most players, coaches and umpires ran for cover in the dugouts; the grounds crew rushed out and started to roll the tarp onto the field even though it was not raining; they stopped but then it did start to rain, causing a 46-minute delay
